kernfrasen: power for new life restores people
silver and gold have I none

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The world is under new management. There has been a 'regime change'.

mapping_structuur.doel_element: The shift from death to life

cognitieve_implicaties: The old rules no longer apply
There is a new authority to answer to
theologische_implicaties: Resurrection is a socio-political reality, not just a private one
ethische_implicaties: Loyalty must shift from worldly powers to God

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Uses modern corporate/political language to shock the hearer out of a 'spiritualized' view of Easter.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher masterfully weaves the Juridical, Economic, and Medical domains by framing the 'Court' as the place where 'Money' and 'Medicine' are contested by 'Resurrection'.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Contrastive blending: The lack of economic capital is presented as the prerequisite for spiritual/medical power.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Healer' metaphor by stripping it of 'magical' connotations and grounding it in 'alternative medicine' and social practice.
sterktes.voorbeeld: I do not say these things to you because we believe in some kind of magical 'faith healing'... No.

risicos.beschrijving: By equating resurrection so closely with 'health care' and 'well-being', the transcendent/eschatological dimension of the afterlife might be obscured.
risicos.voorbeeld: The outcome of good health care... is walking and leaping and praising God!
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view the Gospel primarily as a social service program.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A high-stakes first-century courtroom filled with elite power players.
sub_worlds: The Temple gate with a beggar

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective; it collapses the time gap between the text and the occasion.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Emphasizing the physical 'leaping and dancing' as the intended state of creation.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Reframing it as 'Regime Change' and 'Alternative Medicine'.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits a dedication of a health center or a social justice-oriented Eastertide service.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by a 'Conflict of Systems' landscape. It pits the 'System of Money/Court/Status Quo' against the 'System of Resurrection/Healing/New Management'. This creates a powerful binary that forces the listener to choose a side.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Risk of being seen as 'magical' or 'merely social'.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source domain by describing the physical struggle of the 'lame' man more viscerally.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The atrophy of muscles, the dust of the temple floor, the shame of the cup.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly use the 'Cost of Discipleship' metaphor to bridge the economic gap.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Management implies a hierarchy that can be impersonal.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Relational' domain to ensure God is not just a 'better CEO'.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: The text mentions the 'stone the builders rejected'. Using this would strengthen the 'Regime Change' theme.
alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: Christ as the Cornerstone of the new society.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful use of CMT to turn a familiar miracle story into a radical critique of modern social structures.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of focusing on the beauty of the 'leaping' imagery, CMT focuses on how 'leaping' functions as a cognitive entailment of 'New Management'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'experience/reflection' to analyze the underlying conceptual mappings that make the experience possible.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher is not just telling a story, but re-wiring the hearer's 'Health Care' schema to include 'Resurrection' as a functional variable.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'Container' schema (in the name of, in custody, in the shuffle) to define spheres of influence.
